frame.name: Measure_scenario
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular <fen>Value</fen> for an <fen>Attribute</fen> which may be described in several different ways, including: <ex></ex> <fen>Degree</fen> of deviation from the <fen>Value</fen> expected for the kind of <fen>Entity</fen> seen in a particular instance, or in comparison to some other explicit comparison set. <ex></ex> Absolute quantification in terms of the number of <fen>Count</fen>s of a particular <fen>Unit</fen> which equal the <fen>Value</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.</def-root>

FE.name: Value
FE.definition: <def-root>A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Value</fen> from the norm.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular <fen>Value</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular <fen>Value</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Unit
FE.definition: <def-root>A standard measure, having a known value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Count
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of <fen>Unit</fen>s which are equivalent to the <fen>Value</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen> .</def-root>
